0.Description: Kick the enemies ahead of you, launching them to the air.
Shoot a powerful energy bullet that attacks the enemies in front.
Shoot continuously at enemies knocked into the air.
Quickly fire with both guns. Can move while using this skill.
Approach the enemies with great speed, and then fire at enemies close range.
Attacks done by the guns go through enemies.
Rapidly slide back and avoid incoming attacks.
Throws a smoke screen in an area. Enemies in the smoke will be slowed.
Throws a poisonous gas grenade in an area. Enemies in the smoke will be poisoned.
Improve concentration to aim at the enemy's weak points.
Convert the guns into a machine gun, firing rapidly at enemies. The fire duration increases as the skill level increases.
Fires a powerful energy at the end of the attack. Inflicts paralysis at the affected area.
Fires a powerful energy at the end of the attack. Enemies will be pulled to the center of the affected area.
Fastly move forward and fire at enemies close range.
Convert the guns into a sniper rifle, shooting a powerful shot that penetrates through enemies in a straight line.
Attacks done to the enemy ignore enemy's defense.
Convert the guns into a grenade launcher, which fires a powerful grenade that explodes and deal damage to the enemies.
Fire many grenades by converting the guns into a grenade launcher in the air, dealing damage over a large area.

Fire a signal flare into the air and drop a
missile ahead. The missile cause a series of
explosions.
